result.eng: How many times did they fail?
result.ga: cá liacht uair a theip orthu
result.orig: cá liacht uair a theip orthu
result.html: cá liacht uair a theip orthuHow many times did they fail?
result.ponchtml: cá liaċt uair a ṫeip orṫuHow many times did they fail?

result.eng: I'm afraid that I will fail.
result.ga: tá eagla orm go dteipfidh orm
result.orig: tá eagla orm go dteipfidh orm
result.html: tá eagla orm go dteipfidh ormI'm afraid that I will fail.
result.ponchtml: tá eagla orm go dteipfiḋ ormI'm afraid that I will fail.
